```{r setup}
library(quizlite)
```


```{r example}
quizlite_knit(question(text = 'wat',
             answer('Answer 1'),
             answer('Answer 2',correct = TRUE),
             answer('Answer 3'),
             answer('Answer 4')),
    question(text = 'A new question?',
             answer('Answer 1'),
             answer('Answer 2', correct = TRUE)))
```
